anthropic_oauth.title: Authorize with Claude
anthropic_oauth.description:
1. Click the link to authorize: [Open Claude Authorization]({auth_url})
2. After authorizing, copy the code shown
3. Paste it below and click Submit

data_description.code: Paste the authorization code from Claude

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authorize OAuth
reauth_confirm.description:
Your OAuth session has expired. Please re-authorize:
1. Click the link: [Open Authorization]({auth_url})
2. After authorizing, copy the code shown
3. Paste it below and click Submit

configure.title: Configure {provider}
configure.description: Enter your {token_label} and optionally select a model

data_description.gemini_token: Enter your Google Gemini API key
data_description.model: Choose a predefined model or select 'Custom...' to enter your own
data_description.custom_model: Enter a custom model name (only used if 'Custom...' is selected above)
data_description.rag_enabled: Enable semantic search for entities. Reduces token usage by providing only relevant context.

error.oauth_failed: OAuth authorization failed. Please try again.
error.gemini_token: Google Gemini API key is required

abort.oauth_reconfigure_not_supported: To reconfigure OAuth, please delete and re-add the integration
abort.reauth_successful: Re-authentication successful! The integration will reload automatically.
abort.reauth_entry_removed: The integration entry was removed. Please set up the integration again.

init.title: AI Provider Settings
init.description: Current provider: {current_provider}. Select a provider to configure

data_description.gemini_token: Enter your Google Gemini API key
data_description.model: Choose a model or select 'Custom...' to enter your own
data_description.custom_model: Enter a custom model name (only used if 'Custom...' is selected above)
data_description.rag_enabled: Enable semantic search for entities. Reduces token usage by providing only relevant context.
